statementParser.pageDescription: Upload a bank statement (PDF, CSV, or TXT) to extract transactions using AI. Requires an AI API key configured in settings.

steps.uploadDescription: Upload statement and extract transactions with AI
steps.accountDescription: Choose or create an account for the transactions

uploadExtract.dragDropText: Drag and drop your statement file here, or
uploadExtract.progressMessage: This may take 30-60 seconds depending on the document size
uploadExtract.continueMessage: Continue to select an account for these transactions.

medium.title: Large file detected
medium.description: Processing may take 1-2 minutes. Please be patient.

high.title: Very large file detected
high.description: Processing may take several minutes due to the file size.

extreme.title: Extremely large file
extreme.description: Processing may take 5+ minutes. Consider splitting the file into smaller parts for faster processing.

uploadExtract.freeApiWarning: You're using free AI access which has daily rate limits. For the fast and uninterrupted service, add your own API key.
uploadExtract.addApiKeyLink: Add your API key in settings â†’

accountSelect.linkedToBanksTooltip: For now, statement import is limited to system accounts only.

accountSelection.currencyNotDetected: Could not detect statement currency. Please select the currency manually:
accountSelection.currencyMismatch: The statement currency ({statementCurrency}) differs from the account currency ({accountCurrency}). Transactions will be imported using the account currency.

createAccountDialog.title: Create Account for Import
createAccountDialog.description: Create a new account to import your statement transactions.
createAccountDialog.currencyLocked: Currency is locked to match the statement ({currency}).
createAccountDialog.currencyWillBeAdded: Note: {currency} will be added to your currencies.

transactionReview.duplicateInfoSkipped: {count} transactions will be skipped as duplicates.
transactionReview.duplicateInfoOverridden: {count} duplicates have been overridden and will be imported.
transactionReview.toggleInfo: Click on a row to toggle:

importResults.readyDescription: Review the summary below and click "Import Transactions" to proceed.
importResults.importingDescription: Please wait while we import your transactions...
importResults.successDescription: Your transactions have been successfully imported.
importResults.partialDescription: Some transactions could not be imported.
importResults.batchIdDescription: You can use this ID to find and manage all imported transactions.
